message: Can anyone explain the meaning of life to me in 50 words or less?
It's 42, according to the universe. Don't overthink it, Doo Dah.
Randall, you're always so pragmatic. I think it's about the journey, not the destination.
Is there food on this journey? Because I'm getting hungry.
Fuzzy, you *always* bring it back to food. And yes, I brought pizza.
